DOC.brief_summary: To establish bioequivalence (BE) under fed conditions between metformin in linagliptin/metformin fixed dose combination tablet and metformin reference product administered in free combination togther with linagliptin
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence of Metformin Under Fed Conditions After Administration of Linagliptin / Metformin Fixed Dose Combination Tablet and Single Tablets
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: 1. Healthy male and female subjects Exclusion criteria: 1. Any relevant deviation from healthy conditions
